tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited for painless root canal treatment and my experience was amazing due to following reasons:
1.  It was truly painless and comfortable  root canal treatment.
2. The doctor explained the issue and treatment in detail along with cost of treatment.
3. The doctors were very professional and committed  to their profession.
4. They were valued the patient‚Äôs time and wait time was never more than 5 mins.
5. The clinic had nice ambience which itself relieved the initial tension.
6. The staff was courteous and empathised with the patient.
Both Dr. Arpit and Dr Ruchi are doing a great work
reply_text: Thanks a lot vishal . You were amazing . Full of positivity . And thanks for the amazing review

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very professional and caring team! We were lucky to find this clinic. We ll becoming here for all issues in the future

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am very much satisfied with your treatment.  I was suffering from gum ache for last week and took various medicines but of no use.  I got very much relief from pain after taking medicine prescribed by you. I am very much thankful to you Doctor. God bless you.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hey Doc,
Just wanted To express my gratitude from the very depth of my heart...  I am actually thanking you for all your treatment also for all your efforts in treating me.
Also honestly speaking you are probably only one dentist specialist on whom I can blindly trust. Thankfulness to you doctor for your patience & your team for taking my  case into your  consideration.

tags: None
review: The clinic is equipped with all the modern technological equipments which provide accurate data required to treat the problem , Dr Arpit's methods always ensure that the problem gets treated. After a treatment there I can confidently say that dental problems are no longer a subject of fear.
reply_text: Thank you sohil for these  valuable words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: It was Dr. Ruchi who did the composite filling for my teeth which had chipped. I found the costs a little bit on the higher side than the previous dentist by almost 60% but I must say Dr. Ruchi has the patience of a saint and an absolutely soft hand. Her work is done very well. Thank you Dr. Ruchi. Neat and clean place with absolutely polite staff. Trupti Patel
reply_text:
Thanks a lot . 
Highly appreciate the positive feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Amazingly friendly and helpful. Knows his job and does it well. Insists for having a cup of coffee as you step in. Good decor, hygienic conditions and very comfortable as you wait for your turn. Well managed and well mannered staff. Maintains post Covid-19 hygiene issues. Will definitely recommend. 10 on 10.
reply_text: Thanks a lot uncle

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: What I have experienced everytime i have been to Spaceline ...Is that Dr Arpit and Dr Ruchi have used and upgraded their dental clinic with the best technology at par with global trends to treat the tooth issues in the most painless way possible.. it comes with a cost but I think what you get in return is worth it..
reply_text: Thanks aditi for an amazing review

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: Teeth Straightening,Cosmetic Filling,Implant Rehabilitation,Dental Cleaning,Dental Fillings,
review:
Doctor recognised immediately my dental issues and addressed my treatment with photos, Xrays and full explanation of how best to achieve longterm results. A plan for my procedure is in the planning stage after consulting with me first, which has reassured me of any concerns I had.
I feel excited to know I am in good hands and confident that my doctor will achieve the planned goals ahead.
reply_text: Thanks a lot . These words mean a lot to us and hope we live upto it . We will try our best to achieve what you expect .

review: Dr Arpit Doshi reverted back on phone regarding my issue of dental problem. Also attended me at his clinic today morning . In this testing time where other doctors are not ready to open the clinic, Dr Arpit actually ensure that his patients are looked after. Thank you Dr Arpit

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Arpit and Ruchi Doshi are phenomenal.  I have been getting treatment from them for the last 5 weeks.  This last treatment was a frenectomy which saved me from a more painful and expensive soft tissue graft.  My recovery has been phenomenal and the tissue that was pulling down on and causing lower front teeth gum recession is no longer doing so.  The gums there are naturally recovering and coming up.  Amazing what the human body can do with the right guides at its disposal.  Thank you Drs!
reply_text: Thanks a lot

reply_text: Thank you mr hemant we value yr feedback and continue doing good work

tags: Value for money,
review: I have issues with my tooth..  had to go for root canal..  the doctor explained everything very nicely.  but the price he quoted**  *** **** ******* ** *** *** ******  ** *** ******* ******* ********* I understand we live in Ghatkopar.. and you need to match the locality.. but still the pricing has to be thought  ******* ******* *** * *******  **
reply_text: Its root canal plus building the tooth and a metal free digital crown .using a digital scanner . And it's a standard price in mumbai not in ghatkopar . Infact much  more in few areas

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Bad experience. Had undergone ortho treatment to close the gaps between teeth. But after around two years gaps reappeared.  Actually doctor had forgotten to give retainer to wear aftr completions of my treatment. Dat was the main reason i got to know when visited to someother doctor. ***** ****** ******* ******* *** ********
reply_text:
Thanks for your feedback 
Patient was given fixed retention 
Patient had been treated 7 years  broken the lingual bonded retainer.
Have not cleared the dues even after we have her additional aligners 4 years back 
Returned after 4 years of messed up teeth by someone else 
and didn't respond to the treatment . Patient doesn't want to pay for anything wants everything for free .
And We are ready to treat you again but at least patient needs to bear material cost .
